Un juego de puzzles perfecto y original, sin acertijos demasiado complicados y una historia que va sobre la intriga de lo que pasa en los Laboratorios de Aperture Science junto con un toque de humor acompañados por una de las grandes villanas de los videojuegos, GLaDOS. No dura más de 3 horas y en rebajas está regalado. Un must have.

Absolutely awesome game, complicated puzzles and fast paced parkour combine to create a masterpiece that is the spiritual successor to Half Life 2. I can honestly say this game has had some of the best moments in my entire gaming life. If you don’t have this game, you really ought to try it.
This truly is worthy of its placement in the Orange Box

A great puzzle game. Very innovative, you may need to understand how the portals work in the beginning, but once you get the hang of it you can have a blast. A great short story, with an interesting villain.
Glitches i faced:
sometimes companion cubes didn't appear when they were supposed to(loading the saved file again solved it.)

갓겜 그 자체. 잔머리 잘 굴리면 깨는데 전혀 어려운거 없음. 하다보면 ㅇ.ㅇ? 이런 표정 될 때가 많음. 그리고 게임 특성상 퍼즐(?) 풀어서 진행해야하는데 좀만 생각하면 어떻게 진행해야할지 감이 잡힘. 나도 퍼즐 요소 들어간거 절대 안하는데 이 게임은 진짜 재밌게 함. 처음 하면 3~4시간이면 엔딩 볼 수 있음.

Can't recommend this game enough. Just got through my fist play through and can say that I am thoroughly impressed. Classic

Basically required playing for any pc gamer. The puzzle game aspect is revolutionary in mechanics and pacing. And would be great on its own, but the story elevates it to beyond amazing. The story is so nuanced, creative, and intriguing that even people who don't play video games know references. Speaking of non-gamers:
When I want to get no gamer friends into gaming I have them play this game. The outstanding way new mechanics are layered on top of one another has never been recreated. This combined with the terrific story create a gameplay environment perfect for engaging new gamers.
Re piola. Los Challenge Maps son un ardor anal.

What else can I say? It's Portal. If you haven't played it before, try it out. If you have played it before, play it again.  Absolutely one of my top 5 favorite games of all time.
